text: @WhiteHouse Failed trade negotiations, failed disarmament talks, failed immigration policies, lowest job approval rating in modern times, failed COVID-19 response, economic tailspin and skyrocketing federal deficit. ALL TRUMP. TRUMP IS A PATHELOGICAL LIAR AND A CORRUPT AND INEFFECTIVE LEADER
